 Collection of Thomas Paine manuscripts

 collection

P. S. Foner (ed.), 1945, The Complete Writings of Thomas
Paine, 2 vols., Secaucus, NJ: The Citadel Press.
[This is referenced as CW in the text.]

vols., New York: G.P. Putnam’s Sons.

Hazel Burgess (ed.), 2010, Thomas Paine: A Collection of

p. 185).]

R. Gimbel, 1956, Thomas Paine: A Bibliographical Checklist of
‘Common Sense’, New
Haven: Yale University Press.

F. Oldys [pseud for G. Chalmers], 1791/3, The Life of Thomas

Paine,London.

Paine,  London: T.C. Rickman.

–––, 1984, Thomas Paine’s American

Brent, C., 2009, ‘Thirty Something: Thomas Paine at Bull House in Lewes 1768–74—Six formative years’ Sussex Archaeological Collections , 147, 153–67.
